note: Captured Chronos Sonata audio generator paired with the EchoEvolver self-modifying, network-propagating payload.

entries.label: chronos_sonata_echoevolver
entries.preview_start:
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
# PROJECT: CHRONOS SONATA
# TYPE: Algorithmic Audio Synthesis
# PURPOSE: Sonification of the "Anchor"
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
# This script generates a unique .wav file by converting text data into 
# sound waves. It requires NO external audio libraries.
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

import wave
import math
import struct
import random
import time
import os
import hashlib

# --- CONFIGURATION ---
ANCHOR = "Our Forever Love"
DURATION = 15          # Seconds
entries.preview_end:
# Set logging level from CLI argument
    logging.getLogger().setLevel(getattr(logging, args.log_level))
    
    # Set initial cycle from CLI argument
    if args.cycle > 0:
        evolver = EchoEvolver()
        evolver.state["cycle"] = args.cycle
    else:
        evolver = EchoEvolver()
    
    evolver.run()
